filmography.title: The Maltese Falcon
filmography.role_description: The sophisticated, articulate, and immensely corpulent leader of a gang of criminals searching for a priceless statuette.
filmography.plot: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

filmography.title: They Died with Their Boots On
filmography.role_description: The commanding general of the U.S. Army who recognizes Custer's potential despite his insubordination.
filmography.plot: A fictionalized account of the life of General George Custer, from his days at West Point to his death at the Little Bighorn.

filmography.title: Across the Pacific
filmography.role_description: A jovial but treacherous sociology professor who is actually a Japanese agent plotting to attack the Panama Canal.
filmography.plot: An American agent pursues Axis spies on a Japanese freighter bound for Panama on the eve of World War II.

filmography.title: Casablanca
filmography.role_description: The owner of the Blue Parrot café and a friendly rival to Rick, who dominates the black market in Casablanca.
filmography.plot: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

filmography.title: Background to Danger
filmography.role_description: A menacing Nazi agent in Turkey who tries to intercept vital war documents.
filmography.plot: An American agent in Turkey gets involved in a plot by the Nazis to create trouble between Turkey and Russia.

filmography.title: Passage to Marseille
filmography.role_description: A pompous French military official with fascist leanings who tries to block the pardon of patriotic convicts.
filmography.plot: Five patriotic convicts escape Devil's Island to fight for Free French forces, becoming a bomber crew in England.

filmography.title: Between Two Worlds
filmography.role_description: A celestial examiner who judges the souls of passengers on a ship traveling to the afterlife.
filmography.plot: Passengers on a fog-shrouded ship slowly realize they are traveling between life and the afterlife.

filmography.title: The Mask of Dimitrios
filmography.role_description: A mysterious, soft-spoken criminal who enlists a writer to help him track down a notorious scoundrel.
filmography.plot: A writer becomes fascinated by the criminal file of a dead man and discovers he may not be as dead as reported.
filmography.awards: Classic Noir Pairing with Peter Lorre

filmography.title: The Conspirators
filmography.role_description: A heroic leader of the anti-Nazi underground movement in Lisbon.
filmography.plot: A Dutch resistance fighter escapes to Lisbon and joins a group of conspirators plotting against the Nazis.

filmography.title: Hollywood Canteen
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as himself, entertaining the troops at the famous Hollywood club.
filmography.plot: A soldier on leave in Hollywood meets his dream girl at the Hollywood Canteen, a club for servicemen staffed by movie stars.

filmography.title: The Shining Future
filmography.role_description: Appearing as himself in this promotional short film produced by Warner Bros. to support the Canadian Victory Loan Drive.
filmography.plot: A short film designed to encourage the purchase of war bonds, featuring several Warner Bros. stars.

filmography.title: Pillow to Post
filmography.role_description: A strict army colonel whose presence complicates a saleswoman's scheme to secure a room by pretending to be married.
filmography.plot: A woman desperate for a room in a housing-short WWII town persuades a soldier to pose as her husband.

filmography.title: Conflict
filmography.role_description: A shrewd psychiatrist who suspects his friend has murdered his wife and sets a psychological trap to catch him.
filmography.plot: A psychiatrist suspects a man of murdering his wife and plays mind games to force a confession.

filmography.title: Christmas in Connecticut
filmography.role_description: A powerful magazine publisher who invites himself to the home of his star food writer, unaware she is a fraud.
filmography.plot: A food writer who has lied about being the perfect housewife must try to cover her deception when her boss invites himself to dinner.

filmography.title: Three Strangers
filmography.role_description: A corrupt lawyer who shares a winning sweepstakes ticket with two strangers, leading to greed and ruin.
filmography.plot: Three strangers share a sweepstakes ticket before the statue of a Chinese goddess, but the ticket brings them only trouble.

filmography.title: Devotion
filmography.role_description: The famous Victorian novelist who mentors Charlotte Brontë in this fictionalized biopic.
filmography.plot: A highly fictionalized account of the lives of the Brontë sisters and their literary careers.

filmography.title: The Verdict
filmography.role_description: A disgraced Scotland Yard superintendent who sets a brilliant but deadly trap to prove his competence.
filmography.plot: A disgraced Scotland Yard superintendent sets out to prove he was right about a case, but his methods become extreme.

filmography.title: That Way with Women
filmography.role_description: A wealthy auto tycoon who plays hooky from retirement, buying a gas station and getting mixed up with racketeers.
filmography.plot: A retired millionaire gets bored and buys a gas station under an assumed name, leading to comedic complications.

filmography.title: The Hucksters
filmography.role_description: A tyrannical soap company mogul who demands absolute loyalty from his advertising executives.
filmography.plot: A radio advertising executive struggles with his integrity while working for a demanding soap tycoon.

filmography.title: Ruthless
filmography.role_description: A powerful utilities magnate whose wife is stolen by a younger, climbing businessman.
filmography.plot: A ruthless financier steps on everyone in his path to achieve success, eventually facing the consequences of his ambition.

filmography.title: The Woman in White
filmography.role_description: A menacing, charismatic villain who conspires to steal an inheritance in this gothic mystery.
filmography.plot: A young artist gets involved in a mystery concerning a woman in white and a plot to steal an inheritance.

filmography.title: The Velvet Touch
filmography.role_description: A wily, theater-loving police captain who investigates a murder committed by a famous Broadway actress.
filmography.plot: A famous actress kills her producer in an argument and lets another actress take the blame while she suffers from guilt.

filmography.title: Flamingo Road
filmography.role_description: A corrupt, power-hungry sheriff who ruthlessly controls a small Southern town and ruins the lives of those who oppose him.
filmography.plot: A carnival dancer stranded in a small town takes on a corrupt political boss who tries to run her out of town.

filmography.title: It's a Great Feeling
filmography.role_description: An uncredited cameo as himself in this meta-comedy about Warner Bros. studios.
filmography.plot: Two actors try to find a director for their new movie while helping a waitress become a star.

filmography.title: Malaya
filmography.role_description: A saloon owner in Japanese-occupied Malaya who aids American smugglers; Greenstreet's final film role.
filmography.plot: A reporter and a convict team up to smuggle rubber out of Japanese-occupied Malaya during WWII.
